nodes.text: Farfalla's Diamonds was an asteroid belt located in the Ruusan system. It held the fifth orbital position around the star Hoth's Brand in the system. Located in the Teraab sector of the Mid Rim, it divided space between the planets Turpimir and Zor Vlahu.
It was named after the Jedi Lord and Master Valenthyne Farfalla.
The word "farfalla" is the Italian for "butterfly".
